title: Alonzo Bodden(Bronco Markups; Modifying Bikes; Fish out of Sturgis, Q&A)
description:
The hilarious @zofunny Alonzo Bodden is back! Alonzo is knows motorcycle and jokes in equal measure which is to say: a lot. He walks us through his crazy bike collection which includes some funky, cool modified pieces.

We also talk about the bike he had no business buying; how he "lost" $2k on a Grom; the one car he would buy if he had $400k to spend; his new special (available on YouTube); and answer your questions. 

Recorded September 9, 2022 

Watch Alonzo's special: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IB53YfmzLeU 

Tour dates: https://www.alonzobodden.com/ 

Go to HelloFresh.com/smokingtire16 and use code smokingtire16 for 16 free meals across 7 boxes AND 3 free gifts! 

Use Off The Record! and ALWAYS fight your tickets! Enter code TST10 for a 10% discount on your first case on the Off The Record app, or go to http://www.offtherecord.com/TST 

Want your question answered? To listen to the episode the day it's recorded? Want to watch the live stream, get ad-free podcasts, or exclusive podcasts? Join our Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/thesmokingtirepodcast

Tweet at us!

The hilarious @zofunny Alonzo Bodden is back! Alonzo is knows motorcycle and jokes in equal measure which is to say: a lot. He walks us through his crazy bike collection which includes some funky, cool modified pieces. 
 
We also talk about the bike he had no business buying; how he "lost" $2k on a Grom; the one car he would buy if he had $400k to spend; his new special (available on YouTube); and answer your questions. 


Watch his NEW special, "Alonzo Bodden: Stupid Don't Get Tired" , on YouTube.  He also won the grand prize in the 3rd season of "Last Comic Standing".
